questions.question: HOW IS ALL I NEED SUNSCREEN DIFFERENT FROM OTHER SUNSCREENS?
questions.answer: It protects your skin from both UV damage and blue light. It also brightens & moisturizes your skin. Appropriately named, it is indeed an all-in-one sunscreen you need.

questions.question: WHY IS APPLYING SUNSCREEN IMPORTANT?
questions.answer: It is a crucial step in the skincare routine as it helps protect the skin from UV damage, sunburn, premature aging, wrinkles, dark spots, and also helps reduce the signs of aging as well as the risk of skin cancer.

questions.question: IS ALL I NEED SUNSCREEN SPF 50 PA++++ GOOD FOR ALL SKIN TYPES?
questions.answer: Yes, it is mindfully made to suit all skin types. It has ingredients that ensure your skin remains protected and free from any irritation.

questions.question: SHOULD I WEAR SUNSCREEN EVEN DURING CLOUDY DAYS AND MONSOONS?
questions.answer: Wearing sunscreen is essential regardless of the weather conditions, both indoors & outdoors. UV rays from natural sunlight and electronic devices can harm your skin.

questions.question: HOW MUCH SUNSCREEN SHOULD I APPLY, AND HOW OFTEN SHOULD I REAPPLY?
questions.answer: The recommended method for applying it is a rule of 2 where you put two lines of sunscreen on your index & middle finger and then apply it to your face.

questions.question: IS ULTRA LIGHT WATER SUNSCREEN SUITABLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES?

questions.question: IS THIS SUNSCREEN SUITABLE FOR DAILY USE?

products.name: SUN MILK 100% MINERAL SUNSCREEN SPF 50 PA++++
products.shortDescription: For Sensitive, Oily & Acne Prone Skin

fullDescription.whatItIs: A mineral sunscreen also known as physical sunscreen, that protects skin by reflecting & scattering UV rays instead of absorbing them. It soothes and brightens skin while controlling excess oil. Its milky lightweight texture absorbs quickly and does not leave any white cast. This non-comedogenic & anti-inflammatory sunscreen is fragrance free and perfect for oily, acne-prone, and sensitive skin types.
fullDescription.whatItDoes: The minerals in this sunscreen physically block UVA-UVB rays and blue light without generating heat on the skin - this makes it safe for acne prone & sensitive skin. It regulates sebum production and removes impurities without clogging the pores. It also soothes redness and inflammation caused by sun exposure. This sunscreen also helps reduce pigmentation and uneven texture.
fullDescription.howItDoes: Formulated with 25% Nano Zinc Oxide & Titanium Dioxide ( naturally occurring minerals) it protects the skin from UVA-UVB rays without irritating it. Niacinamide 3% brightens while Witch Hazel Extract regulates sebum production. Tea Tree Extracts, Cica Extracts and Bisabolol soothe the skin and Willowbark Extract gently exfoliates to clean clogged pores.

questions.question: HOW IS MINERAL SUNSCREEN DIFFERENT FROM CHEMICAL?
questions.answer: Mineral Sunscreens use naturally occurring minerals like zinc oxide & titanium dioxide. These ingredients sit on top of the skin and physically block UV rays away from the skin whereas chemical sunscreen absorbs in your skin.

questions.question: CAN I USE SUN MILK 100% MINERAL SUNSCREEN SPF 50 PA++++ FOR MY SENSITIVE SKIN?
questions.answer: Yes! Our Sun Milk 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 PA++++ is specifically formulated with soothing and 100% natural ingredients that are suitable for sensitive and oily skin.

questions.question: HOW MUCH AND HOW OFTEN SHOULD I APPLY THIS SUNSCREEN?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Nano Zinc Oxide 25% provides broad spectrum UVA-UVB protection without irritating the skin. It is gentle on sensitive skin and acts as a sun blocking agent. In our Sun Milk 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 PA++++, we have used 100% natural ingredients that are safe for daily use!

questions.question: WILL THIS SUNSCREEN CLOG MY PORES?
questions.answer: No! The Sun Milk 100% Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 PA++++ is formulated to be non-comedogenic in nature meaning it is less likely to clog pores and cause breakouts making it a perfect match for acne-prone & oily skin types.

questions.question: HOW OFTEN SHOULD I USE THIS SLEEPING MASK?
questions.answer: Start with 2-3 times per week and gradually increase frequency as your skin adapts. Always follow with sunscreen during the day as the exfoliation process can increase sun sensitivity.

questions.question: CAN I USE THIS WITH OTHER SKINCARE PRODUCTS?
questions.answer: Yes, but avoid using with other exfoliating products on the same night. Use this mask on clean skin and follow with a moisturizer if needed.

questions.question: WILL THIS MASK CAUSE IRRITATION?
questions.answer: The bio-exfoliant formula is designed to be gentle, but some mild tingling may occur initially. If you experience persistent irritation, reduce frequency of use.

questions.question: CAN I USE THIS SERUM WITH OTHER ACTIVES?
questions.answer: Yes, but introduce gradually. Avoid using with retinol or AHA/BHA in the same routine. Use Vitamin C in the morning and other actives at night for best results.

questions.question: HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE TO SEE RESULTS?
questions.answer: You may notice improved radiance within 2-4 weeks. Significant improvement in dark spots and pigmentation typically occurs after 6-8 weeks of consistent use.

questions.question: WHY IS SUNSCREEN IMPORTANT WHEN USING VITAMIN C?
questions.answer: While Vitamin C provides antioxidant protection, sunscreen is essential to prevent new pigmentation and protect the newly revealed skin layers from UV damage.

questions.question: WILL THE OIL PHASE MAKE MY SKIN GREASY?
questions.answer: No. The waterlight texture of this bi-phasic serum ensures quick absorption without leaving a greasy residue. The oil phase is lightweight making it suitable even for oily or combination skin.

questions.question: HOW SHOULD I USE A BI-PHASIC SERUM IN MY ROUTINE?
questions.answer: Shake the bottle well to mix the oil and water phases, then apply a few drops to clean, dry skin. Follow it up with a moisturizing sunscreen during the day such as All I Need Sunscreen for Dry Skin and Ultra Light Water Sunscreen for Oily Skin. At night follow it up with Barrier Care Cream for best results.

questions.question: WHAT MAKES A BI-PHASIC SERUM BETTER THAN A REGULAR SERUM?
questions.answer: A bi-phasic serum offers the best of both worlds: deep hydration from the water phase and nutrient-rich nourishment from the oil phase. This structure mimics the skin's natural barrier, allowing better penetration and performance of active ingredients like brighteners and collagen boosters - which can lead to faster, more visible results.

questions.question: DOES THIS SERUM HELP WITH PIGMENTATION AND DARK SPOTS?
questions.answer: Yes! Formulated with melanin-inhibiting and brightening ingredients, this serum helps fade hyperpigmentation, sun spots, and acne marks over time. The dual-phase delivery ensures that brightening agents like niacinamide or vitamin C penetrate deeper, making the treatment more effective.

questions.question: IS THIS SERUM SAFE TO USE DURING THE DAY?
questions.answer: Yes, the formula is low in photosensitivity, meaning it's safe for daytime use, especially for sensitive skin. Just make sure to follow with broad-spectrum sunscreen to protect your skin and support the brightening benefits.

questions.question: WHY DO I NEED TO USE THE MANGO LIPSCREEN SPF 50?
questions.answer: The skin on your lips is more sensitive than the rest of your face, lacking melanins, the pigment that provides natural sun protection. This makes your lips susceptible to sun damage. Using Lip Balm SPF 50 PA++++ offers broad spectrum protection and moisturization for soft, supple lips.

questions.question: WHY SPF 50 PA++++ IN A LIP BALM?
questions.answer: The skin on our lips is the thinnest, making it prone to UV damage. While a regular sunscreen protects the face and neck from sun damage, the lips stay exposed to it. Hence, we have specially formulated the Mango Lipscreen SPF 50 PA++++ to nourish and protect your lips from sun damage.

questions.question: HOW FREQUENTLY SHOULD I APPLY IT?
questions.answer: We recommend applying it before you step out in the sun and reapply as often as needed.

questions.question: IS THIS A GOOD LIP BALM FOR DARK LIPS?
questions.answer: Yes! It contains 2% Kojic Acid & Vitamin C, both work effectively in lightening dark spots and pigmentation this makes it one of the best lip balms for dark lips.

questions.question: CAN I USE IT UNDER LIPSTICK?
questions.answer: Yes, this lip balm can be used as a base under lipstick. Allow it to absorb slightly before applying your lipstick.

questions.question: WHAT DOES SPF 50 MEAN?
questions.answer: SPF 50 blocks approximately 98% of UVB rays. It's a high level of protection for your lips.

questions.question: CAN I USE THIS LIP BALM FOR DRY & PIGMENTED LIPS?
questions.answer: Yes! Apart from lip lightening ingredients like 2% Kojic Acid & Vitamin C, it also has 1% Vitamin E that prevents dryness and keeps lips smooth and moisturized for a long time.

fullDescription.whatItDoes: Offers instant and long-lasting moisturization to prevent Trans-Epidermal Water Loss (TEWL) caused by dehydration, environmental stressors, etc. It binds water to the skin to repair and acts like a protective shield that keeps your skin safe from daily stressors. It has Natural Moisturizing Factors (NMF), which help in maintaining skin's hydration levels.
fullDescription.howItDoes: 10% Heartleaf Extract provides deep hydration by locking in moisture. 7% NMF + Ceramide Complex strengthens the skin barrier and maintains hydration levels. Panthenol and Beta Glucan work together to soothe and nourish the skin, while Shea Butter offers additional moisture and softness.

ingredients: 7% CERAMIDES & NMF (NATURAL MOISTURIZING FACTORS) COMPLEX: An expansive group of ingredients that substances within skin's uppermost layers that help keep it smooth, hydrated and healthy-looking.
PANTHENOL: Panthenol or Provitamin B5 deeply hydrates, soothes, and repairs the skin.
BETA GLUCAN: Known for its calming & repairing properties, Beta Glucan reduces irritation & boosts skin's moisture retention.
10% HEARTLEAF EXTRACT: Known as nature's hydration booster, it locks in moisture while soothing irritation & redness.
SHEA BUTTER: Rich in fatty acids, it provides intense & long lasting moisturization. It prevents moisture loss, & restores the skin's barrier.

Contains Natural Ingredients. Products with natural ingredients may change color but this does not change their effectiveness.

questions.question: HOW DOES CERAMIDE RICH PILLOW CREAM HELP?
questions.answer: This rich, intensive moisturizing cream is designed to replenish and strengthen your skin's natural barrier, preventing moisture loss and soothing irritation. It contains Ceramides Complex, NMF (Natural Moisturizing Factors), and other nourishing ingredients to hydrate and heal dry, damaged skin.

questions.question: CAN CERAMIDE RICH PILLOW CREAM HELP WITH REDNESS AND IRRITATION?
questions.answer: Yes, the Ceramide Rich Pillow Cream is formulated with soothing ingredients like Heartleaf Extract & Beta Glucan, which helps calm redness & irritation while hydrating the skin.

questions.question: WHAT ARE NMFS/ NATURAL MOISTURIZING FACTORS?
questions.answer: NMFs (Natural Moisturizing Factors) are a group of substances naturally found in the skin that help maintain its hydration and overall health. They work to enhance moisture retention, improve the skin's barrier function, and soothe irritation, resulting in a smoother, more supple complexion.

questions.question: DOES THIS CREAM FEEL GREASY?
questions.answer: No, despite its rich, creamy moisturizing formulation, the Ceramide Rich Pillow Cream has a non-greasy finish, making it comfortable for daily wear without leaving a heavy or sticky residue on the skin.

questions.question: CAN NORMAL SKIN USE CERAMIDE RICH PILLOW CREAM?
questions.answer: Yes, while it is specifically formulated to relieve skin dryness & irritation, the Ceramide Rich Pillow Cream can also be used by those with normal skin, particularly during colder & dry weather when skin tends to lose moisture.

questions.question: IS IT OKAY TO USE BETA GLUCAN DAILY?
questions.answer: Yes! Beta Glucan is a natural polysaccharide that has anti-inflammatory & soothing properties. It helps calm irritated skin, reduce redness, and promote healing.

questions.question: HOW DOES CERAMIDE RICH PILLOW CREAM HELP?
questions.answer: This rich, intensive moisturizing cream is designed to replenish and strengthen your skin's natural barrier, preventing moisture loss and soothing irritation. It contains Ceramides Complex, NMF (Natural Moisturizing Factors), and other nourishing ingredients to hydrate and heal dry, damaged skin.

questions.question: CAN CERAMIDE RICH PILLOW CREAM HELP WITH REDNESS AND IRRITATION?
questions.answer: Yes, the Ceramide Rich Pillow Cream is formulated with soothing ingredients like Heartleaf Extract & Beta Glucan, which helps calm redness & irritation while hydrating the skin.

questions.question: WHAT ARE NMFS/ NATURAL MOISTURIZING FACTORS?
questions.answer: NMFs (Natural Moisturizing Factors) are a group of substances naturally found in the skin that help maintain its hydration and overall health. They work to enhance moisture retention, improve the skin's barrier function, and soothe irritation, resulting in a smoother, more supple complexion.

questions.question: DOES THIS CREAM FEEL GREASY?
questions.answer: No, despite its rich, creamy moisturizing formulation, the Ceramide Rich Pillow Cream has a non-greasy finish, making it comfortable for daily wear without leaving a heavy or sticky residue on the skin.

questions.question: CAN NORMAL SKIN USE CERAMIDE RICH PILLOW CREAM?
questions.answer: Yes, while it is specifically formulated to relieve skin dryness & irritation, the Ceramide Rich Pillow Cream can also be used by those with normal skin, particularly during colder & dry weather when skin tends to lose moisture.

questions.question: IS IT OKAY TO USE BETA GLUCAN DAILY?
questions.answer: Yes! Beta Glucan is a natural polysaccharide that has anti-inflammatory & soothing properties. It helps calm irritated skin, reduce redness, and promote healing.

fullDescription.whatItIs: Super hydrating pillowy rich moisturizing cream that instantly relieves skin dryness & compromised skin with 17% skin repair actives! It works overtime to restore skin's moisture & softness. Pillowy Soft Creamy Texture melts into the skin & does not feel heavy or greasy and is fragrance-free.
fullDescription.whatItDoes: Offers instant and long-lasting moisturization to prevent Trans-Epidermal Water Loss (TEWL) caused by dehydration, environmental stressors, etc. It binds water to the skin to repair and acts like a protective shield that keeps your skin safe from daily stressors. It has Natural Moisturizing Factors (NMF), which help in maintaining skin's hydration levels.
fullDescription.howItDoes: 10% Heartleaf Extract provides deep hydration by locking in moisture. 7% NMF + Ceramide Complex strengthens the skin barrier and maintains hydration levels. Panthenol and Beta Glucan work together to soothe and nourish the skin, while Shea Butter offers additional moisture and softness.

ingredients: 7% CERAMIDES & NMF (NATURAL MOISTURIZING FACTORS) COMPLEX: An expansive group of ingredients that substances within skin's uppermost layers that help keep it smooth, hydrated and healthy-looking.

10% HEARTLEAF EXTRACT: Known as nature's hydration booster, it locks in moisture while soothing irritation & redness.
